goals__remit:
We are an international Trade Association with over 1600 Members in 890 countries.Our interests are diverse and widespread and our members fall within the general categories of: 
 
importers and exporters - brokers - dealers - manufacturers - processors of raw material for animal and human consumption - millers - brewers and distillers - analysts - superintendents - fumigation operators - forwarding agents - arbitrators - banks and solicitors 
 
Our aim is to promote international trade in agricultural products - and more recently spices and general produce - and to protect the interests of our members worldwide, providing the support and international contacts they require.
